Package befungeinterpreter

Class Summary
BefungeFrame The main class where everything comes together.
BefungeInterpreterGrid A component providing a Befunge Editor.
BefungeProgram This class represents a Befungeprogram and is able to execute it step by step.
BefungeStack A class that represents the stack Befunge is using.
ConsoleComponent This class provides a Console, i.e. a component which is able to read and display text.
JStatusbarFrame This class is a JFrame with a little statusbar at the bottom.
PC A class that represents the Program Counter of a Befunge Program.
StackFrame This class provides a little Window to show a Befunge Stack's content.
